name: Main Levels Editor
description: customizable thing to change main levels uknowya

COLH.name: Copy Online Level Helper Key Wait
COLH.description: Open level page and push `Insert` key to copy online level

CELH.name: Copy Editor Level Helper Key Wait
CELH.description: Open share level layer and push `Insert` key to copy editor level

DMLH.name: Delete Main Level Helper Key Wait
DMLH.description: Select level and push `Delete` key to delete main level

SGG.name: Stat Gain Guard
SGG.description: ignore stars if its over max value

SGGS.name: ^ SGG Stars:
SGGS.description: ignore stars if its over max value
